<<<<<<< HEAD
The people called Quakers cleared by Geo. Keith from the false doctrines charged upon them by G. Keith and his self-contradictions laid open in the ensuing citations out of his books / by John Penington. Penington, John, 1655-1710. Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723. Postscript.
54 p.
Printed and sold by T. Sowle ..., London : 1696.
Postscript, p. 48-54, signed: G. Whitehead. Imperfect: Item at 1659:3 tightly bound with slight loss of print; item at 1675:13 pages cropped at top with loss of print-title reads "Quakers cleared by Geo. Keith." Item at reel 1675:13 identified as Wing P1230 (number cancelled). Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and British Library.
=======
